pmhal_videopll.c File Reference

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of videopll mode. This file has functions valid only for TDA2xx. More...

#include <stdint.h>
#include "stdlib.h"
#include <ti/csl/hw_types.h>
#include "pmhal_prcm.h"
#include <ti/csl/cslr_dss.h>
#include "hw_pmhal_videopll_data.h"
#include "pmhal_videopll.h"
#include "pm_utils.h"
#include <ti/csl/soc.h>

Macros

#define SET_REG   (0x1U)
 Set Register value.
 
#define RESET_REG   (0x0U)
 Reset Register value.
 
#define UNIT_BIT_MASK   (0x00000001U)
 unit bit mask value.
 
#define ENABLE_DSIPOWER   (0x02U)
 value TO ENABLE dsi power . no clock output to the DSI PHY
 
#define DISABLE_DSIPOWER   (0x00U)
 value TO DISABLE dsi power .

int32_t PMHALVideopllConfigure (pmhalPrcmNodeId_t videopllId, const pmhalVideopllConfig_t *pVideopllData, uint32_t timeOut)
 This API configures different parameters of PLL as indicated by the input. If the multiplier and divider are updated it also makes sure the PLL is locked with new values.The post divider is also considered as part of PLL. This API can be used to configure the PLL with initial values only. More...

int32_t PMHALVideopllSetDivider (pmhalPrcmNodeId_t videopllId, uint32_t divValue)
 This API sets the divide (DPLL N) value of a divider. Value of N should be provided by this API. At reset the divider value will be set to the reset value. If the application need to set a different divider this API shall be called. More...
 
int32_t PMHALVideopllSetMultiplier (pmhalPrcmNodeId_t videopllId, uint32_t mulValue)
 This API sets the multiplication (DPLL M) value of a multiplier . At reset the multiplication value will be set to the reset value. If the application need to set a different multiplication as desired. More...

 This API returns the configured Videopll for given Venc Id. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of videopll mode. This file has functions valid only for TDA2xx.

Function Documentation

static void PmhalDsi1AClkMuxGetParent ( pmhalPrcmClockId_t *  videopllId,
pmhalVideopllHSD_t *  postDivId 
)
static

This API returns the configured mux value and videopll for mux A.

Parameters
videopllIdUnique ID of the video pll which is configured.
postDivIdUnique ID of the post divider which is configured.
Return values
None

static int32_t PmhalIsVideoMuxClkSelValid ( pmhalPrcmVideopllDssClkSrcMuxId_t  muxId)
static

This API verifies if multiplexer clock select is valid or not.

Parameters
muxIdUnique ID of the multiplexer
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the API failed for desired functionality PM_BADARGS Invalid multiplexer id
